item.title: Pure
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Give him your chaos, He'll give it a form. Take all that you will, He'll create even more.

item.title: Perspective
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: I saw a side of myself That I never expected By taking a look From anotherâ€™s perspective.

item.title: Looking Good
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: When things Are looking good, You tend To your mirror. But the clarity You seek, You'll find To be inferior.
